item.title: ACLU sues over Trump shutting down asylum access at the southern border
item.description: Immigration advocacy groups are suing the Trump administration, saying they are illegally shutting down asylum access at the southern border and putting people fleeing war and persecution in harmâ€™s way.

Salvage crews recover engine, large portion of jet from river after deadly air collision near DC
